If you're looking for a superhero movie with a dark and thrilling atmosphere, then "Session 9" (2001) starring Brendan Sexton III would be a great choice. This movie explores tensions within an asbestos cleaning crew working in an abandoned mental hospital.

If you're interested in a historical drama about American fighter pilots, then "Flyboys" (2006) starring Tim Pigott-Smith and Mac McDonald would be a perfect option. This film chronicles the adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I.

If you're looking for a classic film with a heartwarming and suspenseful plot, then "East of Eden" (1952) starring Lois Smith and Burl Ives would be a great choice. This story explores the struggle of two brothers to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor.
